Tukums Sports school stadium

Every morning my day starts with training at Tukums Sports School in the stadium. It is located about 8km from my place of residence towards Riga. It is an important place in sports life not only for the residents of Tukums, but also other athletes in both professional and both at the amateur level. The stadium hosts various trainings every day for sports such as athletics, football, basketball and beach volleyball. Athletics competitions are held here both big and small and football games in which I also participate as captain of the Tukums FC team.
